text.sentence: you missed drew's birthday at mom's.
you did'nt miss much except that chris and oscar got mad because we did not include little oscar in with drew's birthday party.
so both of them are pissed at mom and dad.
and the other thing at the party was that greg and tia celia were both there at the party .
they did not talk to each other.
we also had super ramiro and his band there for a little while.
don't forget to get drew's birthday present, please send cash only!!
